summary: Payment errors, including those resulting from fraud, can plague federal assistance programs—especially for emergencies like COVID-19 and hurricanes. Our oversight has shown us how agencies can do more to manage risks and catch these issues before they occur. To help, we created an overall approach with these steps for agencies: Commit to managing payment errors Identify and assess risks Design and implement controls—e.g., procedures to...
title: A Framework for Managing Improper Payments in Emergency Assistance Programs
